name: Name: WP e-Commerce Free Checkout
author: MyWebsiteAdvisor

sections.description:
Allows for Free Checkout with WordPress e-Commerce Plugin.
Can be used with 100% discount coupons and $0.00 products.
When the cart total is $0.00 the payment form will be replaced with the text ‘Free Checkout’ and offsite checkout will be skipped.

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Support: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/support/

Plugin Page: http://mywebsiteadvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-e-commerce-free-checkout/

Premium Version with Advanced Features including:

  • Available To Members Only Option.
  • Available Only To Specified User Roles Option.
  • Hide Billing And Shipping Address Forms.
  • Customize the ‘Free Checkout’ Message on the Checkout Page.
  • Lifetime Priority Support and Updates!

Learn More Here: http://mywebsiteadvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-e-commerce-free-checkout/

Requirements:

  • WordPress
  • WP e-Commerce Plugin

To-do:
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You can use 100% off coupons and $0.00 product prices.

Developer Website: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/

Plugin Support: http://MyWebsiteAdvisor.com/support/

Plugin Page: http://mywebsiteadvisor.com/tools/wordpress-plugins/wp-e-commerce-free-checkout/

  • Customize the ‘Free Checkout’ Message on the Checkout Page.
